channel.title: Development Contest Questions
channel.description:
Hey guys. I've seen that Budda recently won the game development competition. Back in 07 and 08 I started making private servers. Including the original and popular Alcazar server and failed AlcazarOnline MMORPG. Since then I have become a much more proficient programmer in Java, Python, and C. I'm currently creating a new private server called Embattled, however I just gained knowledge of this game making contests. I will keep developing my server, however I am also interested in the next contest. I was wondering:
1. When is it? 2. What is the time frame in which it can be developed? 3. Is there an assigned theme? 4. Can development be started now? 5. Can I don't plan on using any pre-existing bases or anything, I will start from scratch. Will that give me an advantage over others?
All help is appreciated. Thank you. :)
